title: Racist Receipts From ‘War On Terror,’ 9/11 Merchandising Bonanza! 9.10.21
itunes:title: Racist Receipts From ‘War On Terror,’ 9/11 Merchandising Bonanza! 9.10.21
description:
In episode 986, Jack and Miles are joined by Salted Logic's Hina Wilkerson to discuss Terry Albury's experience in the FBI after 9/11, Trump continuing to make stuff up, America's merchandising obsession, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. ‘I Helped Destroy People’
  2. Trump Appears to Be Making Stuff Up About 9/11. Again.
  3. DONALD TRUMP I'M GETTING 'OBSCENE' AMOUNT OF MONEY ... For Calling Holyfield/Belfort Fight
  4. The bid bombers of eBay
  5. 'Ghoulish Souvenirs' From 9-11 Attack
  6. Spitzer halts saleof 9/11 coins he calls fraud
  7. Return of the Fake WTC Coin
  8. 9/11 Commemorative Coin Formerly "New Low," Now $56.95
  9. The 'disgusting' 9/11 memorial coloring book
  10. FEMA's 9/11 Coloring Book Aims to Teach Kids About Tragedy
  11. 9/11: 11 Tasteless Sales, Costumes and Events Inspired by the Terror Attacks
  12. The tacky practice of using 9/11 to market consumer goods backfires yet again
  13. Families infuriated by ‘crass commercialism’ of 9/11 Museum gift shop
  14. 9/11 Families Blast ‘Greedy,’ ‘Disrespectful’ Decision To Store Unidentified Remains Underground In Museum
  15. Families infuriated by ‘crass commercialism’ of 9/11 Museum gift shop
  16. New York's 9/11 Museum pulls controversial item from gift shop
  17. This 9/11 Cheese Plate May Be The 9/11 Museum's Most Tasteless Souvenir
  18. 20 YEARS LATER
  19. LISTEN: BADBADNOTGOOD - Beside April

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
